long_description: This Thule Get-A-Grip Paddle Holder is versatile carrier of a paddle, an oar or a mast--it's fully lockable and has universal mounting. Fits items up to 4 in. in diameter. Integrated cable secures items and deters theft of expensive paddles. Equipment protection provided by integrated rubber cushion. Sold as a pair; carries one paddle. Tuck it next to the Hull-A-Port (sold separately) and transport your paddle and kayak in style!
short_description: This Thule Get-A-Grip Paddle Holder is versatile carrier of a paddle, an oar or a mast--it's fully lockable and has universal mounting.
